ComicInfo.Summary:
Hit-Girl's wreaking havoc in Colombia. Armed to the hilt, she kidnaps the country's most notorious killer-for-hire and sets out to slaughter every gang member and criminal lowlife in Palmira. This is the gloriously violent, frenetic return of the world's most bloodthirsty 12-year-old assassin. MARK MILLAR and RICARDO LÃ“PEZ ORTIZ join forces for the second installment of Mindy's Colombian adventure.
